body_html: @lazypanda1 It looks like @vishwakftw just started to add some validation logic in probtorch#133. If you'd like early code review on your PR, feel free to send a work-in-progress PR to probtorch/pytorch. We've been doing that for alot of the distributions PRs: first a review on probtorch/pytorch, then close that and open a final PR for review on pytorch/pytorch.

body: @lazypanda1 It looks like @vishwakftw just started to add some validation logic in https://github.com/probtorch/pytorch/pull/133. If you'd like early code review on your PR, feel free to send a work-in-progress PR to probtorch/pytorch. We've been doing that for alot of the distributions PRs: first a review on probtorch/pytorch, then close that and open a final PR for review on pytorch/pytorch.
